intro: Blast your way through swarms of robotic enemies in this fast-paced, retro-style sci-fi FPS!
description:
Armed with unique and powerful weapons, you’ll fight your way across three action-packed levels filled with chaos, explosions, and voxel-based mayhem. Collect health, ammo, and shimmering gems to stay alive and upgrade your arsenal as you battle ever-stronger enemies.

Dodge incoming projectiles, outsmart flying drones, and unleash devastating firepower to survive the panic! With colorful low-poly visuals and old-school shooter energy, Voxel Panic delivers a thrilling arcade experience that’s easy to pick up but hard to put down.

Are you ready to blast, dodge, and conquer the voxel invasion?
